name: Validate WO to Syock Entry
Sales Invoice Minimum Order Quantity Validation
script:
customer_group = frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "customer_group")

moq_list = frappe.db.sql("""
    SELECT moq.name
    FROM `tabMinimum Order Quantity` AS moq
    LEFT JOIN `tabMOQ Customer` AS moq_customer ON moq.name = moq_customer.parent
    WHERE moq.customer_group = %s
    AND (moq_customer.customer = %s OR moq_customer.customer IS NULL)
""", (customer_group, doc.customer), as_dict=True)

for m in moq_list:
    mo_doc = frappe.get_doc("Minimum Order Quantity", m['name'])
    moq_details = {(detail.item, detail.uom): detail for detail in mo_doc.moq_details}

    for item in doc.items:
        key = (item.item_code, item.uom)
        if key in moq_details:
            mo = moq_details[key]
            if mo.qty > item.qty:
                frappe.throw(f"The {item.item_code} Item Must Have Greater Qty Than {mo.qty} With UOM of {item.uom}")
